Definition at line 26 of file vert_drive.cpp.

void commandVectorCallback ( const geometry_msgs::Twist::ConstPtr &  vel)

updates control percents, updates thruster percents, and publishes the updates thruster percents to the rov/cmd_horizontal_vdrive topic. Currently no vector math is needed due to primitive vertical control system. Control percents are directly multiplied by 1000 for thrusters percents.

Parameters
[in]velvel Input from the joystick, ros_control_interface and ROS Control PID algorithms
